entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:57PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On The Chandalar River Through Monday... High water is now moving down the Chandalar River from heavy rain and heavy snowmelt in the Brooks Range the past several days. entry.summary: ...High Water On The Fortymile River Through Monday... The Fortymile River is rising rapidly tonight, with the river continuing to rise through Sunday.
